attestLender(uint256,address,uint256,uin.details: The signature must match that of the market owner.

params.lenderAddress: The address of the lender to add to the market.
params.marketId: The market ID to add a lender to.

params._initialOwner: Address who will initially own the market.
params._requireLenderAttestation: Boolean that indicates if lenders require attestation to join market.
params._uri: URI string to get metadata details about the market.

returns._0: Array of addresses that have been added to a market.
The address of a market's owner.

isPayable().details: Returns whether the resolver supports ETH transfers

returns._0: Boolean indicating if a lender has been added to a market.

resolve(address,bytes,bytes,uint256,addr.details: This function must only be called by the `attestLender` function above.

params: @param attestor Market owner's address who signed the attestation.
params.data: Data the must include the market ID and lender's address
params.recipient: Lender's address who is being attested.
params.schema: The schema used for the attestation.

returns._0: Boolean indicating the attestation was successful.

params.uri: A URI that points to a market's metadata.

params.newOwner: Address of the new market owner. Requirements: - The caller must by the current owner.

attestLender(uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: Adds a lender to a market via delegated attestation.

getAllVerifiedLendersForMarket(uint256).notice: Gets addresses of all attested lenders

getMarketOwner(uint256).notice: Gets the address of a market's owner.

getMarketURI(uint256).notice: Gets the metadata URI of a market.

isVerifiedLender(uint256,address).notice: Checks if a lender has been attested and added to a market.

setMarketURI(uint256,string).notice: Sets the metadata URI for a market.
